name: Beggar
message: The fall of the great Valdir is what happened

name: Traveler
message: All of the city is in this state?

name: Traveler
message: You don't want to tell me?

name: Beggar
message: I will for a price... 5 occidental coins

name: Traveler
message: Pfff... better be worth my time

name: Beggar
message: It will, Basically since the ascent of Almeric II everything has become a hellhole

name: Beggar
message: The rich are even more rich and we are sinking in debts and diseases but no one cares

name: Beggar
message: There are more of us every week, and the city is getting more and more dangerous

name: Beggar
message: Anyway, if you want to see less desolate areas I recommend you to go to the workers distric up ahead

name: Traveler
message: Well I will go there then

name: Beggar
message: Whatever, I don't care, I just want to get out of here

name: Pordiocero
message: I don't have anything else to tell you
